comprehensive_overview: The SRA Toolkit is a collection of tools and libraries for accessing data in the Sequence Read Archive (SRA), a large repository of next-generation sequencing data. It provides command-line utilities and APIs to download, transform, and analyze high-throughput sequencing data.
core_features: Downloading sequencing data from the SRA database
Converting data formats (e.g., SRA to FASTQ)
Quality control and filtering of sequencing data
